page.title: 07Shopping Facilities.
page.content: The main shopping facility in our grid is the Asda Hypermarket opened in November 1984.About 350 people work there,mostly part-time.They work in various departments eg Produce,Bakery, Provisions,Butchery,Grocery,Hardware, Software Restaurant and Warehouse. About 2000 customers per day shop there.It is open late most evenings and has 28 checkouts.Also in our area there are three shopping precincts at Whitchurch,Radyr and Tongwynlais.The last two are smaller with some 6-12 shops selling a variety of household goods.Whitchurch village is very popular and has supermarkets,D.I.Y., newsagents,clothes shops,pet shops, hairdressers,general stores,jewellers, and florists.There are 4 banks,3 estate agents,solicitors,an off licence and three public houses. The parking of cars is free.
